pullrequest.title: New parsing framework, drop the 2, parity basis

content.raw:
Yes, the example notebooks will be updated in a PR immediately following this one. I have already done the updating; rather than do a PR to Keaton's branch and then update this one, we'll just issue it immediately afterwards.

I also agree that hte random seeds should be fixed. Keaton, if you need a hand with any of this, let me know. I'm pretty free tomorrow.

Yes, the example notebooks will be updated in a PR immediately following this one. I have already done the updating; rather than do a PR to Keaton's branch and then update this one, we'll just issue it immediately afterwards.

I also agree that hte random seeds should be fixed. Keaton, if you need a hand with any of this, let me know. I'm pretty free tomorrow.
